content: lyle the lobster version a-2 january 6 2007 materials needed -any worsted weight yarn approx 2 oz red and a small amount of black i used ltk s 3-ply -g hook or hook needed to obtain gauge -stuffing of your choice this can be wool roving polyester fiberfill fabric scraps of yarn…use your imagination -tapestry needle and stitch marker gauge 4 75 sts and 4 5 row per inch in single_crochet body nd round 1 w/ red chain 3 single_crochet in 2 chain from hook and in next chain then single_crochet in the free loops on the opposite side of the chain join w/ slip_stitch 4 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 2 single_crochet in ea st around join w/ slip_stitch 8 single_crochet round 3 chain 1 2 single_crochet in 1st st single_crochet in next 2 st 2 single_crochet in next 2 st single_crochet in next 2 st 2 single_crochet in last st join w/ slip_stitch 12 single_crochet rnds 4-5 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch round 6 chain 1 2 single_crochet in 1st st single_crochet in next 4 st 2 single_crochet in next 2 st single_crochet in next 4 st 2 single_crochet in last st join w/ slip_stitch 16 single_crochet rnds 7-17 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch round 18 chain 1 working in the back loops only single_crochet in each st around join w/ slip_stitch rnds 19-20 chain 1 working through both loops single_crochet in each single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch rnds 21-23 repeat rnds 18-20 round 24 chain 1 working in the back loops only single_crochet in next 4 sts 2 single_crochet in next 2 sts single_crochet in the next 6 sts 2 single_crochet in the next 2 sts single_crochet in the next 2 sts join w/ slip_stitch 20 single_crochet round 25 chain 1 working through both loops single_crochet in next 5 sts 2 single_crochet in next 2 sts single_crochet in the next 8 sts 2 single_crochet in the next 2 sts single_crochet in the next 3 sts join w/ slip_stitch 24 single_crochet round 26 chain 1 single_crochet in next 6 sts 2 single_crochet in next 2 sts single_crochet in the next 10 sts 2 single_crochet in the next 2 sts single_crochet in the next 4 sts join w/ sl st 28 single_crochet slip_stitch in the next 7 sts stuff w/ filling of your choice then holding the front and back together chain 1 and slip_stitch the front and back together working through the single_crochet on both sides tail copyright © 2006 by patti gonsalves all rights reserved this pattern is for the personal use of the buyer only no part of this pattern may be reproduced adapted
